job_details.Functieomschrijving:
Ready to architect the future of education? As a Senior Software Engineer at our cutting-edge EdTech company, you'll be the mastermind behind AI-powered learning experiences that are revolutionizing how students engage with knowledge. If you're a technical virtuoso who thrives on autonomy, strategic thinking, and pushing the boundaries of what's possible in education technology, this is your stage.

   Imagine bringing historical figures to life in a TikTok-style app, crafting personalized magical stories that boost comprehension, or developing an AI learning copilot that integrates seamlessly with existing platforms. These aren't just ideas - they're our products, and you'll be at the helm of their technical evolution.

   We're not interested in following trends - we're setting them. Our AI-first approach means you'll be freed from mundane tasks to focus on high-impact decisions and innovative problem-solving. If you're ready to lead the charge in transforming education through technology, we're ready for you.

   What you will be doing

     * Architect the Future: Design and implement scalable, maintainable features that will shape the long-term trajectory of our EdTech products.
     * Drive Innovation: Leverage cutting-edge AI technologies to create unprecedented learning experiences, pushing the boundaries of what's possible in education.
     * Lead Technical Strategy: Make high-stakes technical decisions that directly impact user experiences and product scalability, collaborating closely with product teams to align features with ambitious goals.
     * Ensure Excellence: Monitor and maintain product stability, fine-tune performance, and proactively identify and resolve issues to deliver a seamless experience for thousands of learners.

   What you will NOT be doing

     * Chasing fleeting tech trends or juggling short-term projects with no lasting impact.
     * Wasting your talents on internal IT systems or outsourced projects that don't directly enhance learning experiences.
     * Getting bogged down in endless meetings or wrestling with mundane infrastructure issues.
     * Following a rigid, pre-defined roadmap without the opportunity to influence product direction.
     * Working in isolation - your expertise will be valued, and your voice will be heard in shaping our products' future., Drive the technical evolution of our AI-powered EdTech products, ensuring they are scalable, innovative, and capable of delivering transformative learning experiences to thousands of students worldwide.
job_details.full_text:
Senior Software Engineer, LearnwithAI (Remote) - $100,000/year USD

Ready to architect the future of education? As a Senior Software Engineer at our cutting-edge EdTech company, you'll be the mastermind behind AI-powered learning experiences that are revolutionizing how students engage with knowledge. If you're a technical virtuoso who thrives on autonomy, strategic thinking, and pushing the boundaries of what's possible in education technology, this is your stage.

   Imagine bringing historical figures to life in a TikTok-style app, crafting personalized magical stories that boost comprehension, or developing an AI learning copilot that integrates seamlessly with existing platforms. These aren't just ideas - they're our products, and you'll be at the helm of their technical evolution.

   We're not interested in following trends - we're setting them. Our AI-first approach means you'll be freed from mundane tasks to focus on high-impact decisions and innovative problem-solving. If you're ready to lead the charge in transforming education through technology, we're ready for you.

   What you will be doing

     * Architect the Future: Design and implement scalable, maintainable features that will shape the long-term trajectory of our EdTech products.
     * Drive Innovation: Leverage cutting-edge AI technologies to create unprecedented learning experiences, pushing the boundaries of what's possible in education.
     * Lead Technical Strategy: Make high-stakes technical decisions that directly impact user experiences and product scalability, collaborating closely with product teams to align features with ambitious goals.
     * Ensure Excellence: Monitor and maintain product stability, fine-tune performance, and proactively identify and resolve issues to deliver a seamless experience for thousands of learners.

   What you will NOT be doing

     * Chasing fleeting tech trends or juggling short-term projects with no lasting impact.
     * Wasting your talents on internal IT systems or outsourced projects that don't directly enhance learning experiences.
     * Getting bogged down in endless meetings or wrestling with mundane infrastructure issues.
     * Following a rigid, pre-defined roadmap without the opportunity to influence product direction.
     * Working in isolation - your expertise will be valued, and your voice will be heard in shaping our products' future., Drive the technical evolution of our AI-powered EdTech products, ensuring they are scalable, innovative, and capable of delivering transformative learning experiences to thousands of students worldwide.

job_profile_classification.rationale: The role focuses heavily on designing and implementing AI-powered learning experiences using generative techniques like bringing historical figures to life and crafting personalized stories. It emphasizes building user-facing applications and leveraging cutting-edge AI technologies, aligning with the core responsibilities of a GenAI Engineer.

phrases: revolutionizing how students engage with knowledge
align technical solutions with strategic goals
job_tasks.justification: These phrases indicate a need to understand the educational domain, connect technical work to business objectives, and shape the future direction of the company's products.
The job description explicitly mentions leveraging AI technologies and creating AI-powered experiences, which falls under the modeling category, particularly generative AI given the examples.

phrases: Architect the Future: Design and implement scalable, maintainable features
Drive the technical evolution of our AI-powered EdTech products
ensure they are scalable, innovative, and capable of delivering transformative learning experiences
job_tasks.justification: This category covers the core software engineering aspects of designing, implementing, and evolving user-facing products, ensuring scalability and integration.

phrases: Ensure Excellence: Monitor and maintain product stability, fine-tune performance, and proactively identify and resolve issues
deliver a seamless experience for thousands of learners
job_tasks.justification: Monitoring, maintaining stability, fine-tuning performance, and resolving issues are key aspects of ensuring production-grade systems operate smoothly, aligning with MLOps principles.

skills: pushing the boundaries of what's possible
technical virtuoso who thrives on autonomy
